html-editor.title: Simple Online HTML Editor
html-editor.description: Live HTML CSS JS editor with preview. Edit and test code instantly in your browser. No registration required.
html-editor.example:
Hello World!

Edit this HTML to see live changes.

ai-text-enhancer.title: AI Text Enhancer
ai-text-enhancer.description: Improve and rewrite text using Groq AI models. Proofread, rewrite, and transform your content with AI.

ai-regex-generator.title: AI Regex Generator
ai-regex-generator.description: Generate accurate regular expressions from text descriptions using AI. Powered by Groq.

responsive-checker.title: Responsive Design Checker
responsive-checker.description: Preview how a website looks on mobile, tablet, laptop, Full HD and 4K displays.

json-formatter.title: JSON Formatter & Validator
json-formatter.description: Format, validate, and minify JSON data instantly. Pretty print or compress JSON with error detection. Free online JSON tool.

diff-checker.title: Text Diff Checker
diff-checker.description: Compare two text blocks side by side and find differences instantly. Perfect for code review and document comparison.
diff-checker.example:
Original text here
Second line
Third line

word-tools.title: Word & Text Tools
word-tools.description: Count words and characters, convert text case (uppercase, lowercase, title case), and remove extra spaces instantly.
word-tools.example: Type or paste your text here to count words, characters, and transform case.

url-encoder.title: URL Encoder / Decoder
url-encoder.description: Encode or decode URLs and query strings. Convert special characters for safe URL transmission.

base64-encoder.title: Base64 Encoder / Decoder
base64-encoder.description: Encode text to Base64 or decode Base64 strings. Perfect for data encoding and API integrations.

slug-generator.title: Slug Generator
slug-generator.description: Generate SEO-friendly URL slugs from text. Perfect for blog posts, articles, and web pages.
slug-generator.example: How to Create SEO-Friendly URLs in 2024

timestamp-converter.title: Timestamp Converter
timestamp-converter.description: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa. Supports multiple formats and timezones.

csv-json-converter.title: CSV ↔ JSON Converter
csv-json-converter.description: Convert CSV to JSON and JSON to CSV. Perfect for data transformation and API integrations.

markdown-preview.title: Markdown Preview
markdown-preview.description: Write Markdown and see live preview. Supports GitHub Flavored Markdown with syntax highlighting.
markdown-preview.example:
# Hello Markdown

This is **bold** and this is *italic*.

- List item 1
- List item 2

```javascript
console.log('Hello!');
```

qr-code-generator.title: QR Code Generator
qr-code-generator.description: Generate QR codes from text or URLs. Download as PNG image. Perfect for sharing links and contact info.

image-base64.title: Image → Base64 Converter
image-base64.description: Convert images to Base64 strings. Perfect for embedding images in HTML, CSS, or JSON.

meta-tag-generator.title: HTML Meta Tag Generator
meta-tag-generator.description: Generate SEO meta tags for your website. Includes Open Graph, Twitter Cards, and standard meta tags.

image-compressor.title: Image Compressor
image-compressor.description: Compress images to reduce file size while maintaining quality. Client-side compression for privacy.

image-to-pdf.title: Image to PDF Converter
image-to-pdf.description: Convert images to PDF format. Combine multiple images into a single PDF document. Client-side conversion.

image-resizer.title: Image Resizer
image-resizer.description: Resize images to custom dimensions or percentages. Maintain aspect ratio or set custom width and height.

linkedin-text-formatter.title: LinkedIn Text Formatter
linkedin-text-formatter.description: Format your LinkedIn posts with Bold, Italic, Script, and Monospace text. Free online tool to make your posts stand out.
linkedin-text-formatter.example: Make your LinkedIn posts stand out!

world-clock.title: World Clock & Time Zone Converter
world-clock.description: Track multiple time zones with live updating clocks. DST-safe conversions, working hours overlap, and customizable clock labels.
